Republican lawmakers urge Biden to deactivate campaign TikTok accountA group of 18 Republican lawmakers has urged President Joe Biden to deactivate his campaign's TikTok account citing national security concerns. Exclusive: Japan's Kyushu Electric to wait for US LNG policy clarity on Lake CharlesJapan's Kyushu Electric Power will wait until after the United States resumes issuing export licences for new liquefied natural gas (LNG) projects before deciding on whether to invest in the Lake Charles project, an executive said. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 09:31:00 GMT FMGIOO3Z2JKLFON7QSNB7ZURE4 https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/japans-kyushu-electric-wait-us-lng-policy-clarity-lake-charles-2024-02-20/Yuka Obayashi可持续发展气候与能源
Chinese tourists flock to Southeast Asia as overseas travel bounces backChinese travellers flocked to tourist hot-spots across Asia over the Lunar New Year break, with visitor numbers and spending in destinations including Singapore, Thailand and Malaysia exceeding pre-COVID levels. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 07:11:31 GMT CSFIQ2TA4FNRTEFXCJ6FRQBZLM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinese-tourists-flock-southeast-asia-overseas-travel-bounces-back-2024-02-20/Sophie Yu, Anne Marie Roantree世界中国
Top watchdogs tell China's finance sector to follow Communist Party valuesChina's top financial watchdogs vowed to keep up a campaign to ensure that the sector adheres to Communist Party values and serves the economy while avoiding "excessive" and "reckless" risks, the party's official newspaper said on Tuesday. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 06:36:46 GMT PWV3KREESJPBDA4ZVDUELNV55I https://www.reuters.com/world/china/top-watchdogs-tell-chinas-finance-sector-follow-communist-party-values-2024-02-20/Joe Cash可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
US asset managers ready for China recovery with products stacked upThree straight years of losses from Chinese markets and anti-Beijing rhetoric from Washington have not deterred some U.S. asset managers from introducing products they hope will thrive if Chinese stocks rebound. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 06:08:30 GMT CWY5K2CNSFIONI4NAQC4EYK4TI https://www.reuters.com/markets/us-asset-managers-ready-turn-china-sentiment-with-products-stacked-up-2024-02-20/Suzanne McGee, Megan Davies市场ETF
Tibet Airlines finalises orders for 40 C919, 10 ARJ21 jets from China's COMACChina's Tibet Airlines on Tuesday finalised an order for 40 C919 and 10 ARJ21 jets from COMAC designed to be suitable for high-altitude plateaus, becoming the launch customer for a new variant the Chinese state-owned planemaker is developing. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 03:37:05 GMT CDJ3GQXAPRM2LAUBFECPXB6HBI https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/tibet-airlines-finalises-orders-40-c919-10-arj21-jets-chinas-comac-2024-02-20/Brenda Goh商业航空航天与国防
Taiwan drives away Chinese coast guard boat as frontline island tensions riseTaiwan on Tuesday drove away a Chinese coast guard boat that entered waters near its sensitive frontline islands, in a rise in tensions a day after China's coast guard boarded a Taiwanese tourist boat that a Taiwan minister said has triggered "panic". Tue, 20 Feb 2024 02:21:50 GMT 4KHIFI5JU5NBNP5X7IMH5GNT44 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-minister-says-china-coast-guard-triggers-panic-by-boarding-taiwan-tourist-2024-02-20/Yimou Lee, Ben Blanchard世界亚太地区
How Elon Musk's SpaceX was boosted in Indonesia by a Chinese rocket failureWhen a Chinese rocket malfunctioned shortly after launch in April 2020, destroying Indonesia's $220 million Nusantara-2 satellite, it was a blow to the archipelago's efforts to strengthen its communication networks. But it presented an opportunity for one man. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 02:06:34 GMT 66SYNYJKBRLLHL24BSTJGEWT5E https://www.reuters.com/technology/space/how-chinese-rocket-failure-boosted-elon-musks-spacex-indonesia-2024-02-20/Stefanno Sulaiman, Devjyot Ghoshal, Joe Brock技术空间
European, Japanese shares hover close to record highs, China rate cut draws shrugsEuropean shares teetered just shy of all-time highs on Tuesday, while euro zone wage data did little to jolt struggling government bonds, and Asian shares slipped as a record rate cut in China failed to excite investors.
